translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ

translations.text: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ

translations.text: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn<sup foot_note=77604>1</sup> ˹in the depths of Hell˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe on that Day to the deniers—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

translations.text: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama yukaththibu bihi illakullu muAAtadin atheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatunaqala asateeru al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

translations.text: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kalla bal rana AAalaquloobihim ma kanoo yaksiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ

translations.text: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.text: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma yuqalu hatha allatheekuntum bihi tukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ

translations.text: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn<sup foot_note=77606>1</sup> ˹in elevated Gardens˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: They will be given to drink

translations.text: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ

translations.text: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena ajramoo kanoomina allatheena amanoo yadhakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: wink to one another whenever they passed by,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ

translations.text: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

translations.text: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ

translations.text: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ

translations.text: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
